Central England Temperature 1878 to 2025
Sorted on 14/11/2025         units: Degrees Celsius
Notes:
1) seasonal values are calculated from the monthly data by
   averaging the three monthly values
2) Seasons are Win=DJF   Spr=MAM   Sum=JJA   Aut=SON
3) Winter: year refers to January
4) Seasonal data exist for Spring 1659 onwards
